name: COKUNST Electric Wine Opener, Automatic Corkscrews Wine Bottles Openers, Battery Operated Reusable Wine Remover for Wine Lover Gift Home Kitchen Party
about_this_item: 【POWERFUL & DURABLE】 COKUNST automatic electric wine opener (Batteries Not Included) can help you open any traditional wine bottle with minimum effort. Noiseless and fast, it can safely remove corks in just about 5-7 seconds. Open up to 30-40 bottles one time

【EASY TO USE】 ① Just install the batteries firstly. ② Hold the wine opener vertically on the top of the bottle firmly and press the extract button. ③ Press the upper release button when the cork is extracted, and it will come out automatically in seconds

【LIGHTWEIGHT & PROTABLE SIZE】Our corkscrews wine opener boasts a fashionable finish and protable size 9''H*1.8''W in size, making it perfectly sized for handholding and easy to store away when not in use. Wine opener weight about 210g, handy for you to carry around

【EXQUISITE DESIGN】This wine bottle opener made of the high-quality ABS material and adopts the appearance of carbon crystal black in the overall color-matching design, dotted with two round CD pattern button switch. The overall effect is low-key and durable but presents a noble, fashion and exquisite feeling at the same time

【IDEAL GIFT】This automatic electric wine opener is cordless, lightweight and elegant design, with foil cutter accessories, are the best choice for the gift to wine lover. Ideal for weddings, parties, bar, or home kitchen use
